meanings.definition: Relating to the science of human settlements.

meanings.definition: The study of human settlement patterns.

meanings.sent2: Researchers use ekistic to understand population distribution.
meanings.sent3: The ekistic study of housing patterns can be quite fascinating.
meanings.sent4: In the ekistic world, each house is like a puzzle piece in a grand design.
meanings.sent5: The ekistic field explores the intricate tapestry of human habitation.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the organization and planning of human communities.

meanings.sent2: City officials work on ekistic projects to improve community living.
meanings.sent3: The ekistic idea of community planning can lead to some interesting debates.
